title: FT: Lot of High End HOF'ers & SP's - Cobb, Matty, Young, Johnson, etc.
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FT: Lot of High End HOF'ers & SP's - Cobb, Matty, Young, Johnson, etc.
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following cards available to trade.  These are mostly top-tier HOF'ers/SP's or higher grade cards of mid-tier HOF'ers.  I am NOT looking to sell these at the moment, ONLY to trade them.  I collect just about everything pre-war but here are some items that I'd be especially interested in:

Top Priority:

-T207 McCarthy or Birmingham
-T211 Red Sun (any)
-T213-1 Coupon (any)
-E90-1 SP's or HOF'ers that I need
-E90-2 & E90-3 that I need
-E104 Nadja (any series, any player)
-E105 Mello Mint (any)

Also Interested In:

-any cards I need from E91, E92, E93, E94, E95, E96, E97, E98, E101, E102, E106
-any cards I need from T204, T210, T212, T213-2, T213-3
-T206 tough backs I need (Broadleaf, Drum, red Hindu, Lenox)
-any 19th century (Old Judge, Buchner Gold Coin, Mayo, etc)
-1933-1941 Goudey that I need
-1914-1915 Cracker Jacks
-any other less common tobacco, caramel, or type cards

Please feel free to send any trade offers/lists even if you don't have any of the items I've listed as I always enjoy trading for anything I don't have.  Thanks for looking and please feel free to e-mail me at [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers.
